members.name: Kristen Tonga
members.bio: Kristen has worked in start-ups and enterprise teams in Silicon Alley, Silicon Valley, and sub-Saharan Africa. She has a passion for building teams and products that are both effective and ethical.

members.name: Ivan Gayton
members.bio: Ivan brings extensive humanitarian expertise from his work with Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) and the Humanitarian OpenStreetMap Team (HOT). His background in both field operations and on-the-ground, fit-for-purpose technology provides valuable insight.

members.name: Joshua Oreman
members.bio: With deep technical expertise, Josh brings powerful insights.

members.name: Eduard Bogel
members.bio: Bogel Enterprises, Eduards company, provides IT and digital marketing consultation to small and midsize businesses to optimize IT infrastructure, enhance online presence, and achieve strategic goals.
